queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{canton}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-sequencer}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-mediator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
metadata.name={{release-name-canton-domain-bootstrap}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{canton}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
